attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Help Save the HMV dog from extinction. It may only be a three month period that HMV is saying he is gone for, but three months could turn into 3 years, and then we"ll never se him again. i"d like to gather at least 10,000 signatures to send to HMV to save the Dog!!!!
Please tell everyone you know about this very important social issue, let"s do something good for humanity!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
